title: India-UAE travel gets budget-friendly: Air India Express launches mega sale with flight tickets under Dh350
summary_full: Air India Express has launched a massive sale, slashing one-way fares between the UAE and India to as low as AED 320 for travel throughout 2026. This promotion, offering over five million seats, aims to make trips more affordable for millions of expatriates and budget travellers. The sale includes flexible booking options, encouraging early planning for holidays and family visits.
